== Mangattidam (CT) (627276) ==

Mangattidam (CT) is a town in the [[Thalassery]] taluka of [[Kannur]] district with an area of 16.38 sq. km. and harbouring 4169 households with total population of 18627 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kannur]] is at a distance of 19 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 511 km. Male population is 8805 and female population is 9822. Scheduled Caste population is 267 and Scheduled Tribes population is 84. Census Location Code of the town is 627276<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kanhangad  (m + og) at a distance of 89 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 89 km. Railway station is at Thalassery at a distance of 19 km.
